website_summaries.verdict: Whether snowmobiling, skiing, snowboarding, or performing any other winter sport that requires major protection, you can count on Smith Optics to make the best helmet on the market.
pros: Surpasses competitors with  hybrid SL shell build that provides superior protection and comfort plus a host of exceptional features: warm lining, adjustable climate system with 21 vents, and removable goggle lock
Comes in numerous sizes and colors
cons: Sizing is inaccurate for many, so it may be challenging to find your best size
Expensive, but you get top quality

customer_reviews.title: Protected me in a nasty fall
customer_reviews.text: Bought this helmet before a trip to Alta and I'm very glad I did. I managed to get stuck in a whiteout and took a nasty fall off of a traverse. I hit my head on some hard packed snow and briefly lost consciousness. I am certain that if I was not wearing a helmet of this caliber, I could have been much more seriously injured. Also, the helmet is extremely warm, comfortable, and it looks good. I would definitely recommend this helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Adam H. Modlin

customer_reviews.title: Not same helmet as pictured. Also a WOMEN'S helmet, not a UNISEX. (BLACK)
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this helmet in the mail. Then I opened it. I can't believe this seller would use a picture of the black and green 2019 helmet and then send a different version of the helmet and it was WOMENS, not UNISEX. SUPER DISAPPOINTED with this vendor :( . Will be returning. SIDE NOTE: My head is 57cm and Medium is 55cm-59cm. HELMET IS WAY TOO TIGHT. I got a headache after 2 minutes of wear. Will be purchasing a Large from a different vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helmet looks awesome and top quality
customer_reviews.text: Helmet looks awesome and top quality, but the sizing is completely wrong. I bought this helmet in XLarge (63-67cm) size, as my head is 61.5cm, but the helmet is so small, I cannot even past my head through to put it on, no choice but to return it. Unfortunately, they do not have any larger size.
customer_reviews.author: PAB-3000

customer_reviews.title: Not good for music!!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible helmet light weight yet fancy, fits perfectly, must have helmet! Def worth the price! I couldn’t figure out where to put my AirPods quality drops drastically! You can’t put the AirPods and then the helmet cuz it’s really snug and it will hurt your ear! So if you’re looking for a helmet that allows good quality music this isn’t it! Other than that super good quality
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Buy the next size up to get a proper fit.
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for features and build quality. Now take away 2 stars for sizing inaccuracy. I have a Smith Variant Brim (Large 59-63)from 07-08 that I absolutely love. I bought the same size for the Vantage hoping it would fit as well as the Variant. Sadly it did not fit well. Too snug around the top of my head. Whatever size you normally wear, I recommend getting the next size up for the Vantage. I ended up returning the Vantage, and buying a Smith Variance (large) that fit my head much better. The Variance appears to be a refreshed Variant Brim, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: mcthaniel06

customer_reviews.title: Nice ski helmit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after the unforseen end of the ski season in March 2020. I looked at this ski helmet at various ski shops over my 25 days of pre-COVID skiing in 2020 across Montana, Alberta, BC & Idaho. Every ski shop raved about how nice they are. Fit runs smaller than indicated, I don't have an extra large head (unlike a current US Persident), but it still took a larger than measured helmit to fit comfortably. So beware that these may run small. Looking forward to having a chance to use it in winter 2020/21!
customer_reviews.author: Scott N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this helmet for years and can say that it is an exceptional helmet. I have seen a few reviews complaining about the BOA system and I wonder if it's just user error. My entire family has the Smith Vantage helmets and several friends as well and I have never heard a single complaint about the BOA system. In my opinion it's one of the best helmets you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: James Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Fits Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is awesome, most comfortable helmet I have tried on, no matter the sport. It fits like a glove can be adjusted tighter if need be. The ears have slots for speakers, The vents are well thought out ans function well. The liner comes out easy and can be cleaned. BEST SNOWBOARDING HELMET EVER!
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and reasonably stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love this helmet for several reasons: 1. It’s very comfortable and true to sizing. 2. The small visor keeps goggles in place whether you’re wearing the goggles over your eyes, or have them stored above the visor. Plus I like the way the visor looks. 3. The MIPS is a huge bonus. After a tumble down a very steep slope and hitting my head on said slope, I walked away without any headache.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine N.

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty good helmet
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good helmet, but not quite as comfortable as i would have liked. It hurts my ears a little bit, normally because the lining will fold up a bit as i put it on. Wish they would have put some more velcro to keep it down.
customer_reviews.author: Jagvir

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and design. I wear a beanie hat with this helmet and I have no problem with my head staying warm. I mounted a portable light to the helmet because I like to ride early in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Mate of Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Needs a bit more padding, but otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes this helmet a lot, but his one complaint is that the padding at the front of his head is too thin and he gets some sharp feeling around his forehead area. He added some bike helmet padding to fix the problem. He read the reviews on sizing and ordered a medium for his larger head. Fits him well. His favorite feature are the vents.
customer_reviews.author: B.C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Not the same fit as older Smith helmets
customer_reviews.text: Was wearing an older Smith Vantage helmet (large) which fits well, but decided to upgrade to a Mips helmet. This helmet in the same size feels much smaller and pushes uncomfortably on my forehead.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet...Sizing is off.  Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: Helmet Fits...I should be on the lower end of the sizing of this helmet...but I am actually at the high end of the sizing. I measured my head a few times and even had my wife do it for me. They run small, even with he Boa adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: JJP

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES his new helmet!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet replaces his 10+ yr old snowboarding helmet and he LOVES it so much! First off, it is super cool looking but, on top of that, it is comfortable and warm and has awesome safety features! Win! Win! Win! For me, his Mom, if its comfortable, he'll actually wear it! BIG WIN!
customer_reviews.author: Daytona675

customer_reviews.title: Awesome helmet
customer_reviews.text: Awesome helmet. First use at Breckenridge -3F. Vents half open, my head was toasty warm. MIPS is a huge plus. Lightweight and super comfy. Forgot I was wearing a helmet. I’d like to see a magnetic clasp next year like some helmets have. Would upgrade for it.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Fit is much smaller than described
customer_reviews.text: I did multiple measurements of my head and took the largest, 61.5cm, purchased the XL (63-67cm). Even with all adjustments loosened, helmet was so uncomfortably tight it gave me a headache after 5 minutes of wearing. Looks like a nice helmet otherwise, I like the features, but the sizing is so ridiculously far off that it's unusable. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: A bit Tight, but EXCELLENT Protection! Wears FLUSH with Anon Goggles
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had it "tested" last weekend when I crashed on a mointain downhill skiing. While I felt the impact on the back of my head, this helmet has protected my head from a far serious injury should I have chosen not to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: G.I.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement bucket
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old Vantage lid with this one after it was stolen at the hill. Bit bummed I couldn't get the lime yellow colour, but the orange is a nice compromise. It fit snug, but not overly tight, it's light weight, comfortable and warm without being hot. The vents work well to cool me down when needed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Amazing helmet
customer_reviews.text: I was worried because some reviews said it was too small. They must have insanely big heads, I wear a SnapBack on the last buttons and the XL was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but seems worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, my son likes the adjustable vents. Hopefully the MPS is a real worthwhile thing to pay extra for.
customer_reviews.author: David Long Island

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for smaller heads
customer_reviews.text: It is a great helmet but... wayyyyy smaller that you might even expect . I saw this helmet while snowboarding in Utah and got one upon my return .this was one of my best adult decisions made , unfortunately... did not fit .
customer_reviews.author: Papi

customer_reviews.title: This helmet was misrepresented in the description. The one ...
customer_reviews.text: This helmet was misrepresented in the description. The one I received does not have MIPS technology as it was stated. Paid more money for that reason and do not have time to return now before my trip.
customer_reviews.author: andy shirley

customer_reviews.title: Sizing not accurate
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviewers noticed, the sizing is not accurate and the helmet tends to be too small. I am a 59-60 and I bought a large helmet - advertised as 59-63 - but it barely fits. The problem is that I don't have time to replace it, so I'm stuck with it. Thank yu for ruining my ski trip !
customer_reviews.author: Calin Ciordas

customer_reviews.title: Not a MIP
customer_reviews.text: Not a MIP helmet but kept it anyway due to the cost
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I love its style and color. But the incorrect sizing is a bad thing for online shopping. I tried 4 of them in different sizes, including an Asian fit version. My head measure is 58cm. I ended up with the XL (63 - 67 cm). Maybe my head shape is different than others. I am glad that I finally find the right size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Xinhua

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Had a TBI one year ago, so I decided my ten year old helmet should probably be replaced. I was looking for the best I could find and stumbled upon this one on Amazon. Was hesitant due to the higher price, but ultimately pulled the trigger on it since it's seriously so protective. Helmet is very comfortable and looks pretty cool, I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet but with some things that need to be improved
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is lightweight and has a very good air ventilation, that can be perfectly regulated to any conditions. What I do not like is the chin strap, that sits too far back and presses against the throat when tightened. And there are plastic edges from the MIPS and the fit adjustment, which cause pain at the ears and head. Those edges need to covered by softer material.
customer_reviews.author: André Krumpe

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic helmet. Exactly as advertised. I have a somewhat large(er) head and the crown of the helmet was (slightly) snug. But, that's the only flaw I've found. Love this helmet!
customer_reviews.author: T. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Vents great, protects amazingly
customer_reviews.text: Vents great, protects amazingly. First helmet I have bought and I have been snowboarding for about 8 years. This was the top rated helmet and there is no question as to why. Don't cheap out on something that protects your melon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: See ya on the slopes!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my new Smith MIPS helmet. Safe, comfortable, good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a Christmas gift so I have not taken it out of the box yet, but just looking at it I am sure it will be a great helmet for the $18 I paid.
customer_reviews.author: rfm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent helmet
customer_reviews.text: The helmet was delivered very fast by the vendor. I tried it a few hours skiing and I found it extremely comfortable. Definitely it was a good advice to buy one size bigger than my previous Smith helmet. So far so good, I look forward to using it in my upcoming multi-day ski trip!
customer_reviews.author: vate69

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had it out on the slopes yet but I will say ... It feels AMAZING. Incredibly lightweight and a very comfortable fit. Def follow the size guide as it’s pretty accurate. And a great looking helmet too!
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie Perez

customer_reviews.title: A good helmet
customer_reviews.text: You can tell that it is well constructed. A little snug, but seems comfortable nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: cmac

customer_reviews.title: looks good, chips 2
customer_reviews.text: Helmet runs a little smaller side.. pros: vents open and close, looks good, chips 2.0 works well with zip pouch for ear buds. Cons: goggles do not stay above the forehead when not being worn on eyes, fits a littler tighter than sizing shows

customer_reviews.title: MIPS saved me from serious injury this season.
customer_reviews.text: I already fell twice this season and I think the MIPS system saved me from any serious head trauma. Helmet fits perfect and my family can easily see me in a crowd!

customer_reviews.title: Light, comfortable and safe

customer_reviews.text: Product functions at the highest level. Although pricey, I am really happy I made this purchase before going skiing. Vents on the head are perfect and the earmuffs keep the ears nice and warm.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet for my husband and he loves it! It runs slightly small—he tried it out in the store and decided on large (Some of his helmets are size medium). Two sets of ventilation give you many options for venting. Very comfortable and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Hutta

customer_reviews.title: Don't Settle for a Mediocre Helmet - When it comes to safety, do everything you can!  This helmet is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the top of the line ski helmets at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good helmet, but one size smaller
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is good, but one size smaller than normal helmet. Initially I though it just need time to break in. Its very sad because the helmet is otherwise very good.

customer_reviews.title: Good product arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product sold as open box but new. Arrived damaged. Disappointed with the misrepresentation of product.

customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this helmet. It fit well, feels good and looks good.

customer_reviews.text: Amazing helmets especially if you have a sweaty head while skiing. Super ventilated. The zipper held wireless speakers perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: the vents on top of the helmet are great
customer_reviews.text: saved my life, the vents on top of the helmet are great
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Dervishi

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Helmet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet at the same time I had purchased my Smith io7 ski goggles. Together they work wonderfully. I bought the helmet to ensure I got the best protection I could possibly buy for when I am on the slope. This helmet does not disappoint. Although thankfully I haven't had a chance to test how much force it can take I can defiantly say that the helmet is well built and looks very sleek. My helmet had MIPS (Not all colors have this) and you should ensure your helmet does too, this will ensure that you get protection against rotational concussions. Although an expensive helmet it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching on chin strap
customer_reviews.text: Stitching coming undone on chin strap and only just removed it from the shipping box. Did not expect this from such an expensive helmet, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: T. Allan

customer_reviews.title: Too small size listing.
customer_reviews.text: Size is listed as too small. The circumference is listed as up to 63 cm, I am 62 cm and it did not fit at all. The helmet otherwise seems nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lars Emil Aga Haugom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, looks great. Sizing definitely runs small. I have a small melon and the medium fits perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and product for our son. He loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Missing item
customer_reviews.text: Item is priced higher than MSRP and didn't include the OEM soft helmet bag/pouch?
customer_reviews.author: William Baldassarri

customer_reviews.title: One crash and directions say to throw it away
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be high quality but how will I know until I bash my head? Comfortable, easy to use, removable ear covers. HOWEVER, I read the pamphlet and it said that if you do hit your head, you need to destroy the helmet because it will be damaged under the shell where you can't see it. One use only (!) which is ridiculous. How would you know if you fell hard enough to ruin it?? Part of skiing/boarding is falling down so I would have needed 10 helmets for 5 days of skiing and this was NOT an inexpensive helmet. Do your homework before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Life Is Short
